welcome.title: Welcome to GigaMind!
welcome.description_partner: Your AI partner for managing your thoughts and knowledge.
welcome.description_setup: Let me help you with a few settings.
welcome.time_estimate: It takes about 2 minutes to complete.
welcome.default_hint: (You can press Enter anytime to use the default value)

api_key.prompt: Please enter your Anthropic API key
api_key.description: An API key is required for using AI features.
api_key.console_hint: You can get an API key at https://console.anthropic.com
api_key.step_2: 2. Log in and click on "API Keys" menu
api_key.step_3: 3. Click "Create Key" to generate a new key
api_key.step_4: 4. Copy the generated key (sk-ant-...) and paste it here
api_key.retry_hint: Press Enter to retry, ESC to go back
api_key.invalid_hint: Please verify your API key. It should start with 'sk-ant-'.
api_key.quota_hint: API usage has been exceeded. Please check at https://console.anthropic.com
api_key.error_invalid_format: Invalid Anthropic API key format (should start with sk-ant-)

notes_dir.prompt: Where would you like to save your notes?
notes_dir.folder_dialog_hint: Please select a folder in the system folder dialog.

user_name.prompt: What's your name or nickname? (optional, press Enter to skip)

use_cases.prompt: What will you mainly use this for? (multiple selection allowed)
use_cases.controls: Space: Select/Deselect | Enter: Done | ESC: Previous step

existing_notes.prompt: Do you have existing markdown notes? (Obsidian, markdown, etc.)

options.yes: Yes, I'd like to import them

import_source.title: Import Notes
import_source.prompt: Where would you like to import from?

import_path.folder_dialog_hint: Please select the {{source}} in the system folder dialog.

complete.title: Setup is complete!
complete.import_hint: You can check the progress with the "/import" command in chat.
